name: A Little Adventure (Noobdev(IamNoobkunYt))
description:
This is a cute platformer game that teaches you how to make good passwords while having fun at the same time! Join Natasha and Rick as she collects clues to help her to reach the final stage! Join her in the little adventure!

Made for the Cybersecurity Jam!

(There has been a bug where instead of a cute platformer game. Instead what shows up is a murder game about the main character Natasha dead and you are finding clues for her case. please report back if you see this bug. We advise you to stay away from this bug. In the future we will try to fix it. Thank you for your cooperation.)
